---
title: "EDA using tidyverse"
author: "Susie"
format: pdf
---

Packages: 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

Read in data: 
```{r}
data <- read_csv("ISSP_OECD2015.csv")
data

glimpse(data)
```

Remove na observations: 

```{r}
data_clean <- data%>%
  tidyr::drop_na()

data_clean1 <- data%>%
  dplyr::select(-isco)%>%
  tidyr::drop_na()
```
